mapper.select: select idx,title,nickname,contents,place,cate,likes,date_format(create_date,'%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as create_date,hit_cnt from board order by idx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board(title ,nickname, contents, place, create_date, cate, id) values(#{title},#{nickname},#{contents},#{place},now(),#{cate},#{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit_cnt = hit_cnt + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
